languages.text: "Я не планировал окончить свои дни в роли мяса с арены. А вот ты..." {n}Маражай наклоняется вперед и заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Ты легкомысленно предложил{mf||а} мне союз. После всего, что я с тобой сделал... в чем причина?"

"I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"
languages.original_text: "Я не планировал окончить свои дни в роли мяса с арены. А вот ты..." {n}Маражай наклоняется вперед и заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Ты легкомысленно предложил{mf||а} мне союз. После всего, что я с тобой сделал... в чем причина?"

traits.locale_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No tenía intención de acabar como carnaza en la arena. Y entonces...». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti y te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Me ofreciste una alianza, sin más. Después de lo que te había hecho... ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: «No tenía intención de acabar como carnaza en la arena. Y entonces...». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti y te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Me ofreciste una alianza, sin más. Después de lo que te había hecho... ¿Por qué?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我可不打算变成竞技场上的活畜，而你……”{n}玛拉斋靠了过来，盯着你的双眼。{/n}“我对你做了那样的事情，你却毫无芥蒂地提出与我结盟……这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: “我可不打算变成竞技场上的活畜，而你……”{n}玛拉斋靠了过来，盯着你的双眼。{/n}“我对你做了那样的事情，你却毫无芥蒂地提出与我结盟……这是为什么？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は闘技場で肉塊貪りの役割を果たすだけで日々を終えるつもりなどなかった。それにお前は…」{n}マラズハイはあなたの目をじっと見る。{/n}「お前は平気な顔をして俺に同盟を申し出た。あんなことをされたのに…なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺は闘技場で肉塊貪りの役割を果たすだけで日々を終えるつもりなどなかった。それにお前は…」{n}マラズハイはあなたの目をじっと見る。{/n}「お前は平気な顔をして俺に同盟を申し出た。あんなことをされたのに…なぜだ？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'avais certes pas l'intention de finir ma vie dans l'arène comme un vulgaire tas de viande à équarrir. Et puis, vous... {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} Vous m'avez spontanément proposé une alliance malgré ce que je vous avais fait subir... Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'avais certes pas l'intention de finir ma vie dans l'arène comme un vulgaire tas de viande à équarrir. Et puis, vous... {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} Vous m'avez spontanément proposé une alliance malgré ce que je vous avais fait subir... Pourquoi ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte nicht vor, meinen Lebensabend damit zu verbringen, in der Arena das Fleisch zu spielen. Und dann habt Ihr"{n}, Marazhai beugt sich zu dir und fixiert dich mit seinem Blick,{/n} "mir ganz unbekümmert ein Bündnis angeboten. Nach allem, was ich euch angetan hatte ... Warum?"
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte nicht vor, meinen Lebensabend damit zu verbringen, in der Arena das Fleisch zu spielen. Und dann habt Ihr"{n}, Marazhai beugt sich zu dir und fixiert dich mit seinem Blick,{/n} "mir ganz unbekümmert ein Bündnis angeboten. Nach allem, was ich euch angetan hatte ... Warum?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

languages.text: "Ömrümü arenada kurbanlık gibi geçirmeye niyetim yoktu ya. Hem sonra sen..." {n}Marazhai, eğilip gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Sen nasıl oldu da bana ittifak teklif edebildin? Yaptığım onca şeye rağmen... Neden?"
languages.original_text: "I had no intention of ending my days playing the role of meat in the arena. And then you..." {n}Marazhai leans in and locks eyes with you.{/n} "You blithely offered me an alliance. After what I had done to you... Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ömrümü arenada kurbanlık gibi geçirmeye niyetim yok. Hem sonra sen..." {n}Marazhai eğilip gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Sen nasıl oldu da bana ittifak teklif edebildin? Yaptığım onca şeye rağmen... Neden?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
